stories.original_headline: Rocky planet discovered in outer orbit challenges planet formation theory
stories.original_summary: Astronomers have uncovered a distant planetary system that flips a long-standing rule of planet formation on its head. Around the small red dwarf star LHS 1903, scientists expected to find rocky planets close in and gas giants farther out — the same pattern seen in our own Solar System and hundreds
stories.fantasy_headline: New Wandering Orb Found Far Out, Shakes Up Ancient Celestial Lore!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Order of Stargazers has unveiled a peculiar new wandering orb in a far-off sky. This rocky sphere orbits a dim lesser star much further out than expected. It challenges the age-old teachings about how celestial bodies are born and settle in the heavens.

stories.original_headline: DJI’s first robovac is an autonomous cleaning drone you can’t trust
stories.original_summary: It's been eight years since I last reviewed a robot vacuum. Having spent the last two months with a new flagship, I'm shocked by how much they've advanced from early bump-and-run models. In October, DJI launched its very first robovacs in Europe. I've been testing the top-of-the-line Romo P model, w
stories.fantasy_headline: Djinn's Craftworks Guild Unveils Self-Willed Cleaning Golem!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Djinn's Craftworks Guild has revealed its newest invention: a self-willed cleansing golem named Romo. This enchanted artifact can sweep and scrub without human command. However, some question its reliability, saying it often wanders astray from its tasks.
